title: Trading Markets
description: Understanding how securities trade across exchanges, OTC markets, and institutional venues, plus the critical differences between brokers and dealers

sections.title: Types of Trading Markets
topics: Third Market - OTC Trading of Listed Securities

learning_objectives: Distinguish between primary and secondary markets
Identify the four submarkets of the secondary market
Compare auction markets (NYSE) with negotiated markets (Nasdaq)
Explain the role of DMMs, market makers, and ECNs
Apply FINRA's 5% markup policy and know its exceptions
Understand dark pools and after-hours trading risks
